title: Set Up an A/B Test in a Testing Tool
description: A CRO specialist needs to set up a new A/B test in a tool like Google Optimize or Optimizely.

tasks.description: Create a new A/B test and define the URL of the page to be tested.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the basic experiment.

tasks.description: Use the visual editor to create the variant (version B) by changing the text of the main headline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the test variant.

tasks.description: Set the primary conversion goal for the test (e.g., tracking clicks on the CTA button).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly defines what success looks like for the test.

tasks.description: Launch the experiment to start showing the versions to users.
tasks.expected_outcome: The A/B test is now live.
